abstract: U S: Gayda assails N Y Times for articles on Ital policy
snippet: ROME, April 1--Keeping up the strong anti-democratic campaign which has been intensified since the Brenner meeting of Chancellor Hitler and Premier Mussolini, the Italian press today prominently displays the contents of the German......

headline.main: ANTI-DEMOCRATIC FIRE IS CONTINUED IN ITALY; U.S. Linked to Allies as Inciter of War--Envoys Assailed
